metadata.name: Tip My Hat
metadata.description:
This is a collision between 2 water drops in mid air.  One drop is coming up, as part of a rebound column that has split.  The second is coming down, released at a precise time by an electromagnetic valve, to meet the other drop as it rebounds up.

The lighting is from behind.  Two flash units firing at approximately 1/25,000 of a second, freeze the motion, revealing what is happening at the moment of impact.  The colors come from gel filters placed over each flash unit, chosen to compliment each other and provide a pleasing palette for the eye.

For much more information on images like these (and others) and the process behind them, please check out my Discord at https://discord.gg/G4JPcPyJkK here.

And feel free to reach out to me, as I am always happy to engage with people who are interested in my artwork.

Cheers, Max 



Technical info:

Digital image without any post production alteration.
6000 pixels x 4000 pixels @ 360 PPI resolution.  High res file available upon request.
